Package dao

Class CustomerDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.GeneralCrudDaoImpl<Customer>
      • dao.CustomerDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDaoInterface
    public class CustomerDaoImpl
extends GeneralCrudDaoImpl<Customer>
implements CustomerDaoInterface
    Customer Data Access Object Implementation. Class that extends the GeneralCrudDaoImpl abstract class and implements with Customer interface. Methods use to to connect to database and retrieve Customer records.
